attributes.action: Mandatory that all dogs in public must be on a lead.
attributes.additional_details: We are fed up of dogs being mauled, people being bitten and the same thing coming out of people's mouths. It's ok, he/she is friendly. Our dogs are on a lead for a reason. We need a law to protect our dogs and children from out of control dogs. If they want off lead running, hire a dog field, keep us safe.
attributes.background: We need it law that all dogs in a public place be on a lead. Not just under control which is how it is at the present.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710271
